page.title: 17TOURISM Pentney & Narboro'
page.content: With it's pleasant rural setting the area attracts many visitors. {Pentney Park Caravan Site}is one of the finest in East Anglia and in a good position for coastal routes.{ {Pentney Inn}caters for guests in very pleasant surroundings and the adjacent Indoor Bowls Centre attracts players from a wide area. {Local attractions include:}The Ship Inn, The Pottery, The old Maltings, The Water Mill, both Parish Churches and Pentney Abbey. Anglers are able to choose between the Trout Farm, the{Bradmoor Lakes}and the River Nar. } A{Water Ski Club}makes use of the vast lakes created from old gravel pits. {Bird Watching}is another attraction as more birds are enjoying the sanctuary of the water filled gravel pits.
